titleInfo.title: Bluegrass Festival with Jim and Jesse and More at Mountain Music Park (16580)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: One color window card (black on brown) announcing a Bluegrass Festival featuring Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys, Carl Story and his Rambling Mountaineers, Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass, Clayton Hale and Band, Bluegrass Symphony, Paul Walker and Band, Clevinger Brothers and Band, Buck Mountain Boys, Robert Lee Hale, and more at Mountain Music Park on June 13, 14, and 15. Poster features metal photoplates of Jim and Jesse and of Lester Flatt. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/42923/

subject.topic: Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
